message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CY

This paper deals with the task of credibility assessment of textual claims, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. 

The paper also involves the use of neural network architecture for learning the contribution of different modules to the overall credibility of an article, which falls under the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). 

The paper also involves the retrieval of related credible articles from a knowledge base, which falls under the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). 

The paper also involves sentiment analysis of the article, which falls under the sub-category of cs.LG (Learning). 

Finally, the paper deals with the problem of false claims and misinformation on the internet, which falls under the sub-category of cs.CY (Computers and Society).
